thread.title: Starwood Hotels & Resorts announces Chuzhou debut
thread.title_full: Starwood Hotels & Resorts announces Chuzhou debut

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Starwood Hotels & Resorts announces Chuzhou debut
text:
Starwood Hotels & Resorts announces Chuzhou debut   
Oct 12, 2015 eTN   
CHUZHOU, China - Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide, Inc today announced its debut in Chuzhou, a city in Anhui Province, China, with the opening of Sheraton Chuzhou Hotel. Sheraton Chuzhou Hotel marks the brand’s 70th hotel in the region, reaching over 110 hotels in Asia Pacific. 
“The opening of Sheraton Chuzhou Hotel is yet another example of Starwood’s most global hotel brand continuing its aggressive growth in strategic markets all over the world,” said Dave Marr, Global Brand Leader for Sheraton Hotels & Resorts. “China continues to be a vital market for Sheraton as it marches toward the brand goal of adding an additional 150 hotels globally by 2020.” 
Nestled between the Yangtze and Huaihe Rivers, Chuzhou is located in eastern Anhui Province near Nanjing.
